sub_title: Product Marketing Director | Scaling Up Marketing Teams | Unites Product, Marketing & Sales
summary:
Unlocking the full potential of tech companies by uniting Product, Marketing and Sales gets me super energized. As a “player-coach” style manager, I empower my team to collaborate and scale their work so they can grow as marketing professionals.

I am a pragmatic marketing leader who brings 20 years of experience in B2B software, SaaS and DaaS Product Marketing. During my career I have had the privilege to build expertise in adjacent disciplines across multiple industries. This broad skillset enabled me to be successful in launching and growing products, as well as in securing successful business transformations and brand building.

My Drive
I love building and scaling Product Marketing teams. Closely collaborating with senior leadership, product and sales, I build the Go-to-Market Strategies and define the product market combinations that provide a clear path on how to meet & exceed business objectives.

My Expertise
I create strategic value by establishing brand awareness, credibility & trust in target markets. I develop buyer personas driven thought leadership and content marketing programs that feed the demand generation and lead generation campaigns. In partnership with key stakeholders, I create holistic data driven insights and optimize the Go-to-Market Strategies.

My Results
As an all-round marketing professional, I have managed and grown platforms ranging from $1 mio to $30+ mio. And successfully launched products and platforms globally in a wide range of industries that generated anywhere from $1 mio up to $15 mio in the first year.

How Colleagues See Me
Colleagues from around the business value my curiosity and creativity, as well as my persistence to get stuff done. They engage me in complex projects involving strategic market analysis, branding, corporate transformation, communication and corporate values.

I enjoy meeting new people and learning new perspectives. Reach out if you want to talk about anything marketing… or football!

treasury_media.title: Digitalization in Shipping Market Research Report
treasury_media.description: The maritime industry is increasingly transitioning towards digitalization. Digital solutions are being used to help ship owners and operators to improve vessel performance, increase crew and vessel safety, reduce operational costs and CO2 emissions. This market research explores the opportunities, enablers and barriers for digitalization.

treasury_media.title: Weather Maturity Curve for Public Events
treasury_media.description:
An important part of moving up the weather maturity curve is understanding the broader implications of
weather on an organization. It is no longer sufficient to only look at the weather forecast — the science has evolved to a point that when combined with subject matter expertise, weather insights can communicate potential risks and opportunities for a business on a strategic level and move beyond operations.

treasury_media.title: Impact Prediction in Utilities Report
treasury_media.description: Learn more about how US Utility companies are preparing for severe weather and how maturity is moving from outage restoration to grid hardening to the emerging technology of impact prediction.

treasury_media.title: Risk Communicator and US Outlook Report
treasury_media.description:
It’s one thing to forecast the weather; it’s another to understand, prepare for, and mitigate its risks. After all, you can only be ready for hurricanes, lightning, or winter weather if you have a plan and
the right tools in place. With scientific advancements and critical subject matter expertise, individual companies and communities can make confident decisions that help increase safety and reduce the impacts of today’s increasingly common extreme weather events.

treasury_media.title: Business News Radio (BNR) interview on consolidation of weather companies
treasury_media.description:
(BNR announcement)
Een frisse wind
Het blijft het meest besproken onderwerp voor wie even een praatje wil maken: het weer. En dus is het niet verwonderlijk dat het weer ook big business is. Zo heeft het Amerikaanse DTN onlangs MeteoGroup overgenomen. Bob Hendriks en Gerard van Grijn van DTN komen praten over het overnameklimaat in de wereld van de weerdiensten.

treasury_media.title: How It's Made: The Category 6 Guide to Highly Accurate Weather Forecasting
treasury_media.description: This 110 page guide explains how to take a weather forecast from good to great. Learn more about weather observations, metocean model, postprocessing, quality control & data provisioning and meteorological & forecasting expertise.

treasury_media.title: How It's Made: The Shipping Weather Forecasting Guide
treasury_media.description: Have you ever wondered what difference accurate weather forecasts can make in shipping? Want to know how the weather experts improve and enhance what’s available in the market? Our ultimate guide to weather forecasting for the shipping industry will answer all these questions and more.

treasury_media.title: How it's made: The Aviation Weather Forecasting Guide
treasury_media.description: For both airports and airlines, accurate and reliable weather data is essential to make informed decisions on de-icing and gritting during the winter months. These organizations typically rely on weather forecasts delivered by professional meteorologists to ensure they have the right information. But why? What makes the experts stand out from the crowd?

treasury_media.title: How it's made: The Offshore Weather Forecasting Guide
treasury_media.description:
Ever wondered the difference that accurate weather forecasts can make to your next offshore project? 
Our ultimate guide to weather forecasting for the offshore industry will answer all your questions and more.

treasury_media.title: Webinar: Increasing grant success rates with funding insights, discovery and decisions
treasury_media.description:
Funding is a major priority for virtually all research institutions, but finding and securing grants is a time-consuming and increasingly competitive process. To succeed you need to gain insight into the complicated funding landscape, discover hidden opportunities and make informed decisions.
In this webinar, you will learn about the key challenges in funding and how Elsevier’s Funding Institutional addresses them by supporting institutional staff across the funding workflow.

profile_positions.description:
DTN is a global data, analytics and technology company that delivers actionable operational intelligence to organizations with complex supply chains. DTN acquired MeteoGroup in 2019.

After DTN acquired MeteoGroup, I was promoted to Global Marketing Director for weather-related portfolios and industries, leading a multicultural team of senior marketers. I am responsible for a portfolio of around 50 products, across 10+ industries in the Americas and EMEA. Core products represent anywhere from $1 to $10+ million in revenues.

Key responsibilities include
  > Go-to-Market Strategy development and execution 
  > Positioning & Messaging enforcing the DTN brand and digital transformation 
  > Product Marketing and product launches 
  > Buyer profiles development and buyer journey mapping 
  > Demand generation & lead generation campaigns 
  > Thought leadership & content marketing

Accomplishments include:
  > Launching new software and data solutions in multiple markets 
  > Launching thought leadership research and new strategic content concepts 
  > Developing scalable up-sell approaches for multiple portfolios 
  > Driving demand in strategic markets, doubling our prospect base 
  > Building brand awareness for partner ecosystem and amplifying data portfolio market reach
profile_positions.title: Global Marketing Director

profile_positions.description:
MeteoGroup is a European data, software and services company that delivers insights and decision-making solutions to companies and consumers that are impacted by weather. MeteoGroup was acquired by DTN in 2019. 

I was promoted to head Product Marketing and Communication, leading a multicultural team of 7 professionals with 6 nationalities. I was responsible for a portfolio of around 25 products, across 10 industries primarily focused on EMEA. Core products represented anywhere from $1 to $10+ million in revenues.

Key responsibilities included
  > Go-to-Market Strategy development & execution 
  > Demand Generation & Retention campaigns development 
  > Content Marketing & PR 
  > Digital Marketing & marketing automation
  > Pricing model optimization 
  > Integration of MeteoGroup and DTN marketing organizations

Accomplishments included:
  > Build the digital campaign frameworks for the first MeteoGroup marketing automation system 
  > Introduced content marketing program resulting in 150+ publications in 6 months 
  > Exponentially increased productivity of the digital and marketing automation team 
  > Integrated of MeteoGroup into DTN marketing, while retaining talent 
  > Restructured and integrated multiple marketing budgets, resulting in increased marketing ROI
profile_positions.title: Head of Product Marketing & Communication

profile_positions.description:
I was hired to build the Product Marketing organization and transform marketing from a siloed business unit approach to a centralized organization. I took ownership of the Go-to-Market strategy and execution for a diverse portfolio of 25+ products across 10 industries in EMEA that used to be managed by 4 P&L independent business units.

Key responsibilities and accomplishments, included:
  > Build the Product Marketing function and hired the team 
  > Created scalable Go-to-Market approaches for the portfolio 
  > Developed the playbooks and RACI model for effective Product and Sales collaboration 
  > Developed industry agnostic Positioning & Messaging frameworks 
  > Build library of playbooks, standardizing marketing best practices 
  > Optimized agency support for content creation, publication and campaigns
profile_positions.title: Head of Product Marketing

profile_positions.description:
Elsevier is a global information analytics company that helps institutions and professionals progress science, advance healthcare and improve performance for the benefit of humanity.

I was responsible for the Go-to-Market of Elsevier's innovative suite of research tools and platforms that empower institutions and researchers to increase research performance. As the SaaS Marketing expert, I lead a variety of high profile marketing projects in the areas of portfolio marketing and branding, product marketing, business transformation, and growth marketing. 

Key marketing projects included
  > Product marketing for funding and engineering research platforms, up to $33mio in revenue 
  > Branding and Go-to-Market of the new research tools portfolio 
  > Growth marketing for Mendeley, the LinkedIn for researchers 
  > Implementation of corporate and digital transformation from publisher to information analytics company 
  > Marketing integration of corporate acquisitions

Accomplishments included:
  > Relaunch of funding solution, $1m revenues, combined with launch of freemium researcher tool 
  > Secured user adoption and MAU beyond critical mass for researcher features on Mendeley 
  > Turned around monthly active users and searches decline for mature engineering platform 
  > Created brand awareness for new researcher tools portfolio within strategic customer base 
  > Companywide adoption of the new corporate transformation
profile_positions.title: Senior Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
Acision is a global mobile communications network infrastructure company providing mobile internet, messaging and charging systems. Acision was acquired in 2015 by Comverse, now Xura.

I was promoted to Senior Proposition Marketing Manager and responsible for the global Go-to-Market launch of Acision's mobile broadband suite that enables mobile telecom providers to improve the availability and quality of their internet networks.

Key responsibilities and accomplishments included:
  > Launched Policy Management & Control network solution with customer in 16 countries, $15mio deal 
  > Established brand awareness, credibility & trust for Acision as Mobile Broadband player 
  > Build the thought leadership and market research program, resulting in 5 research reports 
  > Drove PR and media exposure resulting >250 pieces of PR and 60% media share of voice 
  > Provided evidence-based validations of corporate strategy through strategic market analytics
profile_positions.title: Senior Proposition Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description: I was responsible for the product launch of Acision's innovative solutions that enable mobile telecom providers to increase their messaging revenues and improve the quality of their internet services. Product launches included the launch of SMS Dialogue Manager, generating $12 mio in revenue share and $33 mio in pipeline with ACV up to $1mio.

Verizon is a global communication networks and platforms provider that offers voice, data and video services and solutions.

I was responsible for the marketing of cloud based National and International Contact Center solutions, enabling companies to centralize their contact center infrastructure and provide better customer service against lower cost.

I was responsible for go to market launch of SNT's innovative suite of Customer Interaction Solutions that combine capabilities in Customer Contact, Research and Technology.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Innovation Manager

I was responsible for leading the yearly Berenschot Business Software research and associated publications. As well as strategy implementation and process optimization projects as a consultant.
